messages.title: Labour's priorities for Banbury & Bicester
messages.content: My pledge to you Local people backing my campaign

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Stop downgrading of Horton hospital - Secure 24hr consultant led maternity - Open new medical school
Build genuinely affordable homes - Stop developers who do not build - Tougher fines for landlords
Oppose PCSO cuts - Fight against police privatisation - More frontline officers
Stop Tory school budget cuts - More money for North Oxfordshire - Keep class sizes down
Good local jobs depend on accessing European markets - Fight Tory Bargain Basement Brexit
Banbury valuable public services are threatened

issues.brexitEurope: Good local jobs depend on accessing European markets - Fight Tory Bargain Basement Brexit
issues.education: Stop Tory school budget cuts - More money for North Oxfordshire - Keep class sizes down
issues.health: Stop downgrading of Horton hospital - Secure 24hr consultant led maternity - Open new medical school

housing.content: Build genuinely affordable homes - Stop developers who do not build - Tougher fines for landlords

leaflet.personalStatement: I live locally with my wife and work for a social housing provider
